generic.no-pm: This cannot be done in private messages
generic.param-must-be-int: The {{param}} parameter must be a whole number
generic.param-must-be-number: The {{param}} parameter must be a number
generic.missing-permissions: You do not have the required permissions to use this command
generic.in-cooldown-singular: You are in cooldown, please wait another second
generic.in-cooldown-plural: You are in cooldown, please wait another {{seconds}} seconds
generic.search-description: I found multiple {{type}} with that name, select one by answering the corresponding number {{list}}

setpermission.invalid-permission: :x: The permission must be a command name, like `ping`, or the name of a command category followed by a `*` like `generic*` to target a whole category.
setpermission.success-allowed: :white_check_mark: Successfully allowed the permission `{{permission}}` for the {{targetType}} {{target}}
setpermission.success-disallowed: :white_check_mark: Successfully allowed the permission `{{permission}}` for the {{targetType}} {{target}}
